name: Inhabit Street Software
overview:
Inhabit Street is a website for the residents of apartment buildings, condos and townhouses. It’s a place to meet your neighbours, manage your strata and find out what’s going on in your neighbourhood.

Each community has it’s own self contained website, with forums for residents, galleries for images of the building and it’s amenities, along with strata management tools. The communities are run and managed by the residents, owners and managers of the community.

If you are looking for a new place to live, you can ask the residents what the building is like to before you commit to moving in.
